code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{useNavigate}from"react-router";import{updateTheme}from"../state/theme/themeSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ThemeSelect(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const currentTheme=useSelector(state=>state.theme.theme);function changeTheme(theme){console.log(theme);dispatch(updateTheme(theme));console.log(theme);navigate(-1);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{id:"themeSelect",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Select a theme"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"elegant",className:currentTheme==="elegant"?"active":"",onClick:()=>changeTheme("elegant"),children:"Elegant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"snow",className:currentTheme==="snow"?"active":"",onClick:()=>changeTheme("snow"),children:"Snow"})]})]});}export default ThemeSelect;
